attributes.action: Bring back National Service for all school leavers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Would you really consider bringing children into this world? You may not think anything of it now while your only young, but one day that will be one of your friends, family, neighbours, you!! Just because your not involved doesn't mean it will never happen to you!! Please help by just signing your name and getting one step closer to removing the knifes, guns and violence from our streets!

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
